products.title: Splash Vine Green Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash vine green a bright and lush green perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous green blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Moss Green Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash moss green perfect fit roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. This soft green, perfect fit roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. Our perfect fit blinds are perfect for upvc windows where a screw-free solution is needed. Using sleek framework and brackets that slide under the window beading, their perfect fit blinds come in a wide array of fabrics and finishes to suit your needs.
